entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness late this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 28. Wind chill near minus 39. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 23. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Periods of light snow over southern sections in the afternoon. Amount 2 cm over southern sections. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High minus 23. Wind chill minus 37 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 28 February 2023
